title: U.S. Stock Futures Fall as Treasury Yields Move Higher
sub_head: Selloff in government bonds continues as inflation concerns linger
body:
U.S. equity futures and Asian stock indexes dropped, while the 10-year Treasury yield continued its upward march following a three-day holiday weekend.
Futures tied to the S&P 500 were down 0.5% and Nasdaq 100 futures were 0.85% lower, indicating that U.S. stocks could decline when markets reopen Monday.
